name: Lakme Hydra Pro Overnight Gel
description: Luxurious gel formula is infused with advanced HA-PENTA complex & Hyaluronic acid. Hyaluronic acid is the revolutionary water bank molecule for skin and Pentavitin is proven to hydrate skin deeply. For Superior results use Lakme Absolute Hydra Pro Gel Crème during the day and Hydra Pro Overnight gel before going to bed to get supple and fresh-looking skin.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
